name: Encouraging behavioural change among tenants and landlords
location: This stream will take place in (room to be confirmed)
description: This session covers the relationship between tenant and landlord and how they can work together towards to reduce energy use in leased buildings. It also includes incentives and illustrated with case studies.

presentations.name: O2 home working during Olympics
presentations.speakers: Ben Dowd, Business Director, O2 UK

presentations.name: Incentives to taking up sustainability measures
presentations.speakers: Helen Drury, Policy Advisor, British Council for Shopping Centres

presentations.name: Going green – adopting a sustainable approach
presentations.speakers: Richard Francis, f Sustainability at Gardiner & Theobald and Chair of the BCO Environmental Sustainability Group

presentations.name: Providing strategic support on sustainability issues
presentations.speakers: Laura Jockers, Director, Upstream Sustainability Services, Jones Lang LaSalle
